title: GxSTxV
author: GxSTxV
content: Hi, i only need 2$ worth of etherum to pay gas fees of sending the tokens i got from altcoins bounty the link of the campaign i participated in is here I will pay you back 4$ usdt after i sell the tokens on lbank My collateral will be the trustwallet account that has the tokens  Link of lbank exchange of g tokens

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 01:01:43 PMHi, i only need 2$ worth of etherum to pay gas fees of sending the tokens i got from altcoins bounty the link of the campaign i participated in is here I will pay you back 4$ usdt after i sell the tokens on lbank My collateral will be the trustwallet account that has the tokens  Link of lbank exchange of g tokens Your TrustWallet account isn't good collateral, accounts of that type can easily be retrieved by social engineering.  The other issue you're going to run up against; gas fees for sending $2 worth of ETH will cost about $1.  Not that $2 is a huge risk for many, but why take the risk to make $1?  I suggest you find another way to get the ETH you need.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 03:17:53 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 01:01:43 PMHi, i only need 2$ worth of etherum to pay gas fees of sending the tokens i got from altcoins bounty the link of the campaign i participated in is here I will pay you back 4$ usdt after i sell the tokens on lbank My collateral will be the trustwallet account that has the tokens  Link of lbank exchange of g tokens Your TrustWallet account isn't good collateral, accounts of that type can easily be retrieved by social engineering.  The other issue you're going to run up against; gas fees for sending $2 worth of ETH will cost about $1.  Not that $2 is a huge risk for many, but why take the risk to make $1?  I suggest you find another way to get the ETH you need.Umm yeah that makes sense to me, well if there’s someone who i can trust i will handle him my account and he can sell the tokens and send me 40$ on usdt and take the rest, otherwise i will buy some etherum tomorrow i just don’t wanna risk the price drops of grn token

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 04:08:20 PMUmm yeah that makes sense to me, well if there’s someone who i can trust i will handle him my account and he can sell the tokens and send me 40$ on usdt and take the rest, otherwise i will buy some etherum tomorrow i just don’t wanna risk the price drops of grn tokenAh, what the hell.  I like your post history, so I'll take a chance on you.  Send me an ERC20 address.  Post it here or send it via PM.  I'll send you 0.0015 ETH, you can send back whatever you feel is fair.  When you're ready to send it back you can send to the same address from which it came.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 04:56:15 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 04:08:20 PMUmm yeah that makes sense to me, well if there’s someone who i can trust i will handle him my account and he can sell the tokens and send me 40$ on usdt and take the rest, otherwise i will buy some etherum tomorrow i just don’t wanna risk the price drops of grn tokenAh, what the hell.  I like your post history, so I'll take a chance on you.  Send me an ERC20 address.  Post it here or send it via PM.  I'll send you 0.0015 ETH, you can send back whatever you feel is fair.  When you're ready to send it back you can send to the same address from which it came.Having a long break from this forum but when I see people like you acting in good faith helping other users, more rare every day either here on irl, I remember why I can't quit for good this place.Sorry for the offtopic but felt the need to share.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 04:56:15 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 04:08:20 PMUmm yeah that makes sense to me, well if there’s someone who i can trust i will handle him my account and he can sell the tokens and send me 40$ on usdt and take the rest, otherwise i will buy some etherum tomorrow i just don’t wanna risk the price drops of grn tokenAh, what the hell.  I like your post history, so I'll take a chance on you.  Send me an ERC20 address.  Post it here or send it via PM.  I'll send you 0.0015 ETH, you can send back whatever you feel is fair.  When you're ready to send it back you can send to the same address from which it came.I appreciate your help, but you should know that i will pay you back on usdt because i will trade the tokens for usdtSo you should send me your usdt address as wellThis is my etherum  address 0x7dd6cEFA0af8B5DE7c0d2e29D64b9576c45fC2E0

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: You're changing the terms *after* you receive the loan?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 06:32:08 PMI appreciate your help, but you should know that i will pay you back on usdt because i will trade the tokens for usdtSo you should send me your usdt address as wellThis is my etherum  address 0x7dd6cEFA0af8B5DE7c0d2e29D64b9576c45fC2E0The ETH has been sent, here's the TxId: 0xed6c033ff8e9dc687358d2adee41136aeb527763fe54a1c0963bcaf1a504ebd2As for the repayment; I wasn't expecting USDT, but whatever.  Please send back to the same address and use the ERC20 chain.  I don't own any stupidchain shitcoins.  In fact I only just recently recovered an old seed and found it still had a bit of ETH in it.  We all grow up eventually.Quote from: Timelord2067 on July 29, 2022, 06:45:16 PMYou're changing the terms *after* you receive the loan?Bad form, I agree.  He should have mentioned it in the OP that was his plan.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 06:57:24 PMHe should have mentioned it in the OP that was his plan.He did mention it.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on July 29, 2022, 07:00:50 PMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 06:57:24 PMHe should have mentioned it in the OP that was his plan.He did mention it.Oh, you're right.  I overlooked it at first because I wasn't planning on granting the loan.  Like I said; whatever.  One shitcoin is as good as another, and at least this one is pegged to the biggest scam coin of all.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: This:Quote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 04:08:20 PMotherwise i will buy some etherum tomorrowwas proposed by the lender prior to funding.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on July 29, 2022, 07:03:13 PMThis:Quote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 04:08:20 PMotherwise i will buy some etherum tomorrowwas proposed by the lender prior to funding.If he doesn't get a loan. There's no point in a loan if he buys Ethereum by himself.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.created_time: July 29, 2022, 07:13:04 PMLast edit: July 29, 2022, 10:07:47 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: I only wanted few dollars to pay the gas fees. I got the from direwolfm14I promised to pay back 4$ USDT as mentioned because i will transfer it to usdt from lbank platform So please send me your usdt address Quote from: Timelord2067 on July 29, 2022, 06:45:16 PMYou're changing the terms *after* you receive the loan?I didn't change anything and i didn't even post anything after the lender sent me 0.0015 ethereum I don't know why people like dramaQuote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 06:57:24 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 06:32:08 PMI appreciate your help, but you should know that i will pay you back on usdt because i will trade the tokens for usdtSo you should send me your usdt address as wellThis is my etherum  address 0x7dd6cEFA0af8B5DE7c0d2e29D64b9576c45fC2E0The ETH has been sent, here's the TxId: 0xed6c033ff8e9dc687358d2adee41136aeb527763fe54a1c0963bcaf1a504ebd2As for the repayment; I wasn't expecting USDT, but whatever.  Please send back to the same address and use the ERC20 chain.  I don't own any stupidchain shitcoins.  In fact I only just recently recovered an old seed and found it still had a bit of ETH in it.  We all grow up eventually.Quote from: Timelord2067 on July 29, 2022, 06:45:16 PMYou're changing the terms *after* you receive the loan?Bad form, I agree.  He should have mentioned it in the OP that was his plan.Usdt is on trc network so please provide me an address on that chain otherwise i will send you back the ETH you sent me

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 07:20:41 PMUsdt is on trc network so please provide me an address on that chain otherwise i will send you back the ETH you sent meI don't use Tron and I won't be buying some anytime soon.  Keep the ETH and do what you have to do.  If you want to wait until you have some bitcoin, you can send $4 worth to the address staked in my profile.  I'm in no hurry.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 07:46:25 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on July 29, 2022, 07:20:41 PMUsdt is on trc network so please provide me an address on that chain otherwise i will send you back the ETH you sent meI don't use Tron and I won't be buying some anytime soon.  Keep the ETH and do what you have to do.  If you want to wait until you have some bitcoin, you can send $4 worth to the address staked in my profile.  I'm in no hurry.I will have some bitcoin soon surely and i will send them to you. I really appreciate your help alot. I will update you soon

comments.author: Timelord2o67

comments.author: DireWolfM14

comments.author: Timelord2o67
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 09:34:42 PMQuote from: Timelord2o67 on July 29, 2022, 08:57:43 PMI can take the USDT on the Tron Network and send DireWolfM14 the ETH if that is any help ?Code:TGJUJ9t2qbTsRxGzwxtjvu3Lyk6Yuc4Xp8I'd rather get bitcoin if it's all the same, but this works too.Either way, if $4 lands in my wallet I'll forward the corresponding amount to you.

comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2o67 on July 29, 2022, 08:57:43 PMI can take the USDT on the Tron Network and send DireWolfM14 the ETH if that is any help ?Code:TGJUJ9t2qbTsRxGzwxtjvu3Lyk6Yuc4Xp8Thank you for your help buddy, i already got some bitcoin and i will be sending it in the next few hours to himI appreciate all the people that tried to help to transfer the tokens. Untill that i still have to payback my loan Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 29, 2022, 07:46:25 PMI don't use Tron and I won't be buying some anytime soon.  Keep the ETH and do what you have to do.  If you want to wait until you have some bitcoin, you can send $4 worth to the address staked in my profile.  I'm in no hurry.As promised i sent you 0.00029629BTC worth of 7$ at the moment to your profile address.
